@dev getStatusListItem - function to let an admin get statusList item from the index we obtained above

statusList updated on status update but these seems outside the logic of the task as we are to only
create statustype, status and get all status ):

addJurStatus(address,uint256).details: addJurStatus - function to let the Jur admin add new address as a Jur Status, thus validating it's license which can be verified on the blockchain.

params._statusHolder: - The address which will hold the Jur Status.
params._statusType: - The position of the value from the statusTypes array signifying the status type.

addStatusType(string).details: addStatusType - function to let an admin add status types to support the bussiness logic.

changeState(address,bool).details: changeState - function to let the Jur admin change the state of a status.

params._statusHolder: - The address holding the Jur Status.

getStatusListItem(uint256).details: getStatusListItem - function to let an admin get statusList item from the index we obtained above A nice to have would have been refactored the change state logic to keep the  statusList updated on status update but these seems outside the logic of the task as we are to only create statustype, status and get all status ):

getStatusListLength().details: getStatusListLength - function to let an admin get all statusList length

getStatusListLength().notice: To get the list of all status I added the following currently solidity does not support return of array except through an experimental feature {pragma experimental ABIEncoderV2;} which is not advisable for production due to known bugs..
